enhanced_by.reason: The synchronizedCollection method ensures thread safety before making the collection unmodifiable.

enhanced_by.method_name: transformingCollection(Collection<E>, Transformer<? super E, ? extends E>)
enhanced_by.reason: The transformingCollection method applies transformations to the collection before making it unmodifiable.
The isEmpty method can be used to assert that the unmodifiable collection is empty or not.
The size method can be used to assert the size of the unmodifiable collection.
